titlestmt.titleproper: Guide to the Vassar College Subject Files, 1864â€“2023
titlestmt.author: Inventory prepared by Archives and Special Collections Library, Vassar College Libraries

publicationstmt.publisher: Archives and Special Collections Library, Vassar College Libraries

profiledesc.creation: Finding aid encoded by Elizabeth Clarke May-June 2007

did.head: Collection Summary

repository.label: Repository:
repository.corpname: Archives and Special Collections Library, Vassar College Libraries

did.abstract: An artificial collection of materials documenting the history of Vassar College, collected by various departments of the Library over several decades. There are also some materials on Poughkeepsie, Dutchess County, the Hudson Valley, students in general, and other colleges.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content Note
scopecontent.p: An artificial collection of materials documenting the history of Vassar College, collected by various departments of the Library over several decades. Included are minutes, reports, questionnaires, letters, publications, programs, speeches, autograph albums, handbooks, articles, clippings, bibliographies, curriculum materials, and other items concerning Vassar College alumnae, anniversaries, art exhibits, athletics, Black Studies, buildings, offices and departments, classes, clubs and organizations, community relations, conferences, deans, faculty, faculty committees, folklore, gardens, Jewish Studies, Library, presidents, religious life, students, trustees, World Wars I and II, and women. There are also some materials on Poughkeepsie, Dutchess County, the Hudson Valley, students in general, and other colleges. Organized by subject.

accessrestrict.head: Access
accessrestrict.p: Some materials relating to the "Vassar Veterans" is currently closed to research. The rest of this collection is open for research according to the regulations of the Vassar College Archives and Special Collections Library without any additional restrictions.

userestrict.head: Restrictions on Use
userestrict.p: Permission to quote (publish) from unpublished or previously published material must be obtained as described in the regulations of the Vassar College Archives and Special Collections Library.

controlaccess.head: Places:
controlaccess.geogname: Hudson River Valley (N.Y. and N.J.)--Description and travel

acqinfo.head: Acquisition Information
acqinfo.p: An artificial collection, collected by various departments of the Library from multiple sources over several decades.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Vassar College Subject Files, Archives and Special Collections Library, Vassar College Libraries.
